name: Coloring Book: Sweet Doll
description:
Best coloring book for girls! Most unique and wonderful digital coloring experience on iPad and iPhone!

* 100+ beautiful girl pictures. ALL ARE FREE!
* 9 beautiful brushes: neon glow, rainbow, crayon, diamond necklace, chalk, ribbon, etc.
* 50+ beautiful pattern brushes
*** Video to record and replay drawing as animation clip.
*** Not only a coloring book, but also a paint and drawing pad just like on real paper.
*** From the creator of beloved Top Free kids game "Kids Doodle".
